And it came to pass in the sixth<S>8345</S> year<S>8141</S>, in the sixth<S>8345</S> month, in the fifth<S>2568</S> day of the month<S>2320</S>, as I sat<S>3427</S> in mine house<S>1004</S>, and the elders<S>2205</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> sat<S>3427</S> before<S>6440</S> me, that the hand<S>3027</S> of the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S> fell<S>5307</S> there upon me.
Then I beheld<S>7200</S>, and lo a likeness<S>1823</S> as the appearance<S>4758</S> of fire<S>784</S>: from the appearance<S>4758</S> of his loins<S>4975</S> even downward<S>4295</S>, fire<S>784</S>; and from his loins<S>4975</S> even upward<S>4605</S>, as the appearance<S>4758</S> of brightness<S>2096</S>, as the colour<S>5869</S> of amber<S>2830</S>.
And he put forth<S>7971</S> the form<S>8403</S> of an hand<S>3027</S>, and took<S>3947</S> me by a lock<S>6734</S> of mine head<S>7218</S>; and the spirit<S>7307</S> lifted me up<S>5375</S> between the earth<S>776</S> and the heaven<S>8064</S>, and brought<S>935</S> me in the visions<S>4759</S> of God<S>430</S> to Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, to the door<S>6607</S> of the inner<S>6442</S> gate<S>8179</S> that looketh<S>6437</S> toward the north<S>6828</S>; where was the seat<S>4186</S> of the image<S>5566</S> of jealousy<S>7068</S>, which provoketh to jealousy<S>7069</S>.
And, behold, the glory<S>3519</S> of the God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> was there, according to the vision<S>4758</S> that I saw<S>7200</S> in the plain<S>1237</S>.
Then said<S>559</S> he unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, lift up<S>5375</S> thine eyes<S>5869</S> now the way<S>1870</S> toward the north<S>6828</S>. So I lifted up<S>5375</S> mine eyes<S>5869</S> the way<S>1870</S> toward the north<S>6828</S>, and behold northward<S>6828</S> at the gate<S>8179</S> of the altar<S>4196</S> this image<S>5566</S> of jealousy<S>7068</S> in the entry<S>872</S>.
He said<S>559</S> furthermore unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, seest<S>7200</S> thou what they do<S>6213</S>? even the great<S>1419</S> abominations<S>8441</S> that the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> committeth<S>6213</S> here, that I should go far off<S>7368</S> from my sanctuary<S>4720</S>? but turn<S>7725</S> thee yet again, and thou shalt see<S>7200</S> greater<S>1419</S> abominations<S>8441</S>.
And he brought<S>935</S> me to the door<S>6607</S> of the court<S>2691</S>; and when I looked<S>7200</S>, behold a<S>259</S> hole<S>2356</S> in the wall<S>7023</S>.
Then said<S>559</S> he unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, dig<S>2864</S> now in the wall<S>7023</S>: and when I had digged<S>2864</S> in the wall<S>7023</S>, behold a<S>259</S> door<S>6607</S>.
And he said<S>559</S> unto me, Go in<S>935</S>, and behold<S>7200</S> the wicked<S>7451</S> abominations<S>8441</S> that they do<S>6213</S> here.
So I went in<S>935</S> and saw<S>7200</S>; and behold every form<S>8403</S> of creeping things<S>7431</S>, and abominable<S>8263</S> beasts<S>929</S>, and all the idols<S>1544</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, pourtrayed<S>2707</S> upon the wall<S>7023</S> round about<S>5439</S>.
And there stood<S>5975</S> before<S>6440</S> them seventy<S>7657</S> men<S>376</S> of the ancients<S>2205</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and in the midst<S>8432</S> of them stood<S>5975</S> Jaazaniah<S>2970</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Shaphan<S>8227</S>, with every man<S>376</S> his censer<S>4730</S> in his hand<S>3027</S>; and a thick<S>6282</S> cloud<S>6051</S> of incense<S>7004</S> went up<S>5927</S>.
Then said<S>559</S> he unto me, Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, hast thou seen<S>7200</S> what the ancients<S>2205</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> do<S>6213</S> in the dark<S>2822</S>, every man<S>376</S> in the chambers<S>2315</S> of his imagery<S>4906</S>? for they say<S>559</S>, The LORD<S>3068</S> seeth<S>7200</S> us not; the LORD<S>3068</S> hath forsaken<S>5800</S> the earth<S>776</S>.
He said<S>559</S> also unto me, Turn<S>7725</S> thee yet again, and thou shalt see<S>7200</S> greater<S>1419</S> abominations<S>8441</S> that they do<S>6213</S>.
Then he brought<S>935</S> me to the door<S>6607</S> of the gate<S>8179</S> of the LORD'S<S>3068</S> house<S>1004</S> which was toward the north<S>6828</S>; and, behold, there sat<S>3427</S> women<S>802</S> weeping<S>1058</S> for Tammuz<S>8542</S>.
Then said<S>559</S> he unto me, Hast thou seen<S>7200</S> this, O son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>? turn<S>7725</S> thee yet again, and thou shalt see<S>7200</S> greater<S>1419</S> abominations<S>8441</S> than these.
And he brought<S>935</S> me into the inner<S>6442</S> court<S>2691</S> of the LORD'S<S>3068</S> house<S>1004</S>, and, behold, at the door<S>6607</S> of the temple<S>1964</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, between the porch<S>197</S> and the altar<S>4196</S>, were about five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> men<S>376</S>, with their backs<S>268</S> toward the temple<S>1964</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, and their faces<S>6440</S> toward the east<S>6924</S>; and they worshipped<S>7812</S> the sun<S>8121</S> toward the east<S>6924</S>.
Then he said<S>559</S> unto me, Hast thou seen<S>7200</S> this, O son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>? Is it a light thing<S>7043</S> to the house<S>1004</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> that they commit<S>6213</S> the abominations<S>8441</S> which they commit<S>6213</S> here? for they have filled<S>4390</S> the land<S>776</S> with violence<S>2555</S>, and have returned<S>7725</S> to provoke me to anger<S>3707</S>: and, lo, they put<S>7971</S> the branch<S>2156</S> to their nose<S>639</S>. <sup>Is it: or, Is there any thing lighter than to commit</sup>
Therefore will I also deal<S>6213</S> in fury<S>2534</S>: mine eye<S>5869</S> shall not spare<S>2347</S>, neither will I have pity<S>2550</S>: and though they cry<S>7121</S> in mine ears<S>241</S> with a loud<S>1419</S> voice<S>6963</S>, yet will I not hear<S>8085</S> them.
